name: PASHTET
description:
PASHTET is a game about streamer from Russia in which you need to help the hamster make money. Collect chests, moving on one of three conveyors and avoid bombs. Your goal is 1 million!
Features:
  • Endless gameplay
  • Beautiful graphic
  • Interesting soundtrack
  • Opportunity to help the hamster
  • Steam Achievements
Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
